column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Hey , Mako , what do you think ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " It 's also a hat rack .
#Text=" Mako says : " We do n't even have hats .
#Text=" Bolin says : " That 's because we never had a hat rack .
#Text=And now we do .
#Text=Mako , you seem stressed .
#Text=I think you need to take a little dipity dip .
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't have time to take a dipity dip , okay ?
#Text=I 'm trying to catch whoever 's been attacking the shipments , and I need your help .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You need my help ?
#Text=I do n't know .
#Text=I 'm kinda busy .
#Text=" Mako says : " You 're sitting in a hot tub .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I 'm maintaining my instrument .
#Text=As an actor , my body is my instrument .
#Text=" Mako says : " Are you gon na help or not ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " You know , I recall a time when I needed your help , and you basically told me to get a life .
#Text=" Mako says : " So that 's a no .
#Text=What am I supposed to do now ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " I do n't know , Mako .
#Text=Figure it out .
#Text=Remember ?
#Text=That 's what you said to me .
#Text=Hurts , does n't it ?
#Text=Ow !
#Text=My instrument !
#Text="
